summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3686 , for the improvement of Brandon Street, from Renton Avenue to Empire Way; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45428 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
